definition: A debt of blood must be paid in blood./Blood calls for blood.
pinyin: xue4 zhai4 yao4 yong4 xue4 lai2 huan2

sentences.english: Who can escape a blood debt that runs into the thousands?
sentences.chinese: 上千条性命的血债，谁又能逃得了呢？

sentences.english: LeiYuan is a man of true temperament, vowed to Quebec accounted for when blood.
sentences.chinese: 雷远是个真性情的汉子，誓要张占魁血债血偿。

sentences.english: Two dogs for Guo cut prisoners, also to take eight finger blood hacked joe.
sentences.chinese: 二狗顶替郭割掳，同样就要担下砍死乔八指的血债。

sentences.english: Do you agree with the saying "Debts of blood must be paid in blood".
sentences.chinese: 你是否同意“血债必须用血来还”的说法？

sentences.english: You know what happens to men who go looking for blood?
sentences.chinese: 知道想血债血还的人会怎样吗？

sentences.english: The oppressed people will score up the debts of blood against imperialism.
sentences.chinese: 被压迫人民将记下帝国主义欠下的血债。

sentences.english: They will not abandon the demand for retribution for the blood of the revolutionary martyrs.
sentences.chinese: 他们不会放弃为革命烈士们血债血偿的要求。

sentences.english: Over the years, Old Wei ran up an enormous blood debt.
sentences.chinese: 多年后，老魏欠下了累累血债。

sentences.english: It is definitely his blood work.

national humiliation, refers to Japanese incursions into China in the 1930s and 40s, and more especially to Mukden railway incident of 18th September 1931 九一八事變|九一八事变 and subsequent Japanese annexation of Manchuria
